name: Dragon Hunters PC
description:
A DICE BASED FANTASY BOARD GAME SYSTEM
Race against your friends and family with local multi-player (1-4 players), while gaining levels, items, and experience as you battle over 30 different monsters before confronting the foreboding Dragon. 

Choose between a Fighter, Cleric, Thief, or Wizard and play a classic style Turn-Based Strategy game. Use Potions during combat to enhance your attacks, or magical spells to do powerful damage! 

Based off a turn based board game system, you will navigate across different game boards to in search of Guardians to unlock new Board Levels. Access different boards and board levels by visiting each doorway on a board.  By defeating monsters, drawing item or chest cards, you can obtain enough gold to Level Up at the Inn. 

Beware of the Throne Card, as it may imbue either positive or negative effects.

Play by mouse and keyboard, or plug up to four USB gamepad,/Xbox Style controllers to play against your family and friends. 

You will get to actually roll the dice to see real physical outcomes instead of behind the scene results.

In Single player mode, you are allowed to play one, two, three, or four characters! 

Dev Notes..3-5-21

*********Please use the ITCH App to download and install as it will keep you up to date with our current improvements happening weekly!***********************

Download App - itch.io

We are excited to  release the Single Player and Local Multiplayer version of Dragon Hunters! 

We decided to release it as "Early Access" as we have plans for Online Multiplayer and future Board Levels with different dragons.

Online multiplayer is already underway and we plan to have Custom / Private Server rooms up to 4 players in a room. Random match making rooms has not been decided at this time.

The first release of Dragon Hunters features the Fire Dragon. Later this year we plan on releasing the Swamp(Black) Dragon, and the Ice Dragon.

 We want you to know that we will continue to work hard on making this a great game and continue to update regularly. 

SG Team.

Tim Perry and Richie Darling
